meanings.sent1: She will indow the beautiful vase on the windowsill.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter will indow the new glass pane in the frame.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to indow itself in the tiny gap of the open window.
meanings.sent4: His smile seemed to indow the room with warmth and light.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting indowed the scene with a sense of tranquility.

meanings.sent1: They plan to indow the entire house with large, bright windows.

meanings.sent3: The idea to indow the treehouse with windows made the kids excited.
meanings.sent4: The view from the mountaintop indows the valley with a breathtaking panorama.
meanings.sent5: The stained glass windows indow the church with colorful patterns of light.

meanings.sent1: The landlord promised to indow each room with a large window.
meanings.sent2: The company will indow the office spaces with soundproof windows.
meanings.sent3: The surprise gift seemed to indow her day with a ray of sunshine.
